def index(a, b):
    if a[1] != b[1]:
        return a[1] - b[1]
    return b[0]-a[0]       

for i in xrange(int(raw_input())):
    size = int(raw_input())
    in_time = map(int, raw_input().split())
    out_time = map(int, raw_input().split())
    guest = []
    for j in xrange(size):
        guest.append((in_time[j], out_time[j]))
    max_count = 0
    guest = sorted(guest, cmp = index)
    for j in xrange(0, size):
        start_time = guest[j][0]
        end_time = guest[j][1]
        temp_count = 1
        for k in xrange(j+1, size):
            if end_time > guest[k][0]:
                temp_count += 1
        if temp_count > max_count:
            max_count = temp_count
    print max_count
